title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, glass beads, linen
Technique: cross stitch and beadwork on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Baskets of flowers, a landscape with a barn and fence, and bands of geometrical and floral patterns are worked in small glass beads.  Alphabets, ships, hearts and the words "Constancia" "Amor Valor" "Esperanza" and "Honor" are in silk cross stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, glass beads, linen
Technique: cross stitch and beadwork on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-191.
